channel.title: BuzzFeed
channel.description: BuzzFeed, Find Your New Favorite Thing

item.title: What Beauty Advice Would You Give Your Middle School Self?
item.description:
How much blush is too much?

Middle school is a rough time.

NBC / Via fallontonight.tumblr.com

You're in that awkward phase where your ~super cute~ hairstyles bordered possible Halloween costume.

Remember those mini buns? Yeah, ya do.

Disney Channel

Looking back on your yearbook photos, you may wonder why no one stopped you.

Are those multi-colored rubber bands on your braces or leftover Skittles? The world may never know.

The Hollywood Reporter / Via big.assets.huffingtonpost.com

And your lipstick may have made you look more like a vampire from Twilight than the ~*glam diva*~ you were aiming for.

Middle school diet: a healthy serving of junk food and lipstick.

ABC / Via fullhousereviewed.com

View Entire List ›
item.author: Lindsey Metrus

group.description: How much blush is too much?

content.description: Remember those mini buns? Yeah, ya do.
Are those multi-colored rubber bands on your braces or leftover Skittles? The world may never know.
Middle school diet: a healthy serving of junk food and lipstick.

item.title: What's Your Best Tip For Maintaining Healthy Hair?
item.description:
My life isn’t perfect, but my hair is.

Good hair days are truly a glorious thing.

Via guh-gifgarden.tumblr.com

But we all know some major TLC goes into sustaining healthy hair.

Via weheartit.com

Via ishareimage.com

Everyone has their own secrets to maintaining their luscious locks...

item.title: Hey, Recent Grads: What's A Question You're Tired Of Hearing?
item.description:
“So, how’s the job search going?”

Graduating from college should be a purely exciting occasion, full of pomp and circumstance and nothing else.

Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer

The truth is it's actually pretty terrifying because, suddenly, the Real World is upon you.

CBS

To make matters worse, adults have about a MILLION questions they want to ask you.

A24

Like, "How's the job search going?" as if you weren't stressed enough.

Fox

View Entire List ›
item.author: Jon-Michael Poff

item.title: People Share The Awkward, Hilarious, Heartbreaking Things They Never Told Their Dad
item.description:
The authors of The Book of Everyone gave out over 3,000 postcards to people in the UK and the US asking people to share something anonymously that they have never told their dads. Here are a few of the responses they claim they received.

item.title: What's The Saddest Moment From Your Favorite Childhood TV Show?
item.description:
RIP Chuckie Finster’s mom.

Growing up in the golden age of '90s and early '00s television was simply amazing.

Nickelodeon / Via wifflegif.com

We were blessed with amazing shows and their ridiculously awesome quirks and jokes.

Cartoon Network / Via praeoccupatio.tumblr.com

But there were definitely some devastating moments that went over our heads as kids.

Nickelodeon / Via giphy.com

Like when Mr. Hyunh was forced to give up his daughter in Hey Arnold!

Dear god, NO.

Nickelodeon / Via haca.wordpress.com

item.title: What's The Most Underrated Vacation Spot Outside The U.S.?
item.description:
Madrid, London, Paris you’re all great, but there’s a whole world to discover.

At long last, summer has finally arrived, bringing with it warm weather, late night shenanigans, and, most importantly, ~vacation~!

(The solstice isn't till June 21, but you get the point.)

Via myparadiseand-i.tumblr.com

But while many people will head to international hot spots like London, Rio, or Sydney...

Syco / Columbia / Via youtube.com

...maybe you're heading somewhere off the beaten path: somewhere beautiful, intriguing, and overlooked.

Via weheartit.com

Maybe it's an old European city like Gdansk, Poland, with its intriguing history and Baltic boat cruises.

instagram.com

View Entire List ›
item.author: Jon-Michael Poff

group.description: Madrid, London, Paris you're all great, but there's a whole world to discover.

content.description: (The solstice isn't till June 21, but you get the point.)

item.title: Which Questions About "Harry Potter" Need To Be Answered?
item.description:
But actually, why are Hufflepuffs badgers?

Harry Potter is one of those stories with a insanely rich back story which leads to a billion questions.

TFI News / Via corneliapornelia.tumblr.com

Maybe you want to know what the deal was with the brains in a tank in the Department of Mysteries.

Warner Bros.

Or do you want to know more about other Wizarding schools around the world?

Warner Bros.

Or perhaps you just want to know what would have happened if Voldy had succeeded in killing Harry when he was a baby.

Warner Bros.

item.author: Jemima Skelley

item.title: What's The Best Thing About Dating Your Best Friend?
item.description:
They say you should date your best friend, and you are!

So you've taken the plunge and you're dating a friend you've known for a while.

Disney / Via littleclaireb.tumblr.com

It's different, but also familiar, and maybe that's what makes it so great.

NBC / Via butlercat.tumblr.com

Maybe you've seen them in a different light after being close to them for so long.

FOX / Via ibelieveinyoubrittana.tumblr.com

Or maybe it's because they've seen you at your best and worst and still stuck around.

NBC / Via samuraitrack.com

View Entire List ›
item.author: Kelcie Willis

group.description: They say you should date your best friend, and you are!

item.title: What's The Most Ridiculous Thing Someone's Asked About Your Natural Hair?
item.description:
No, you can’t touch it.

Whether you've transitioned, are transitioning, or have always worn your hair natural, leaving behind the chemicals can be a liberating experience.

instagram.com

Natural hairstyles are fun, versatile, and allow for an infinite number of creative styling options.

Twists, braids, and locs, oh my!

instagram.com

Not to mention, they look DAMN good.

instagram.com

There's a lot of positivity surrounding the natural hair movement, ranging from helpful styling tips to solidarity and sisterhood.

#curlfriends

instagram.com

item.author: Anjali Patel

content.description: Twists, braids, and locs, oh my!
Thumbnail image courtesy of Craig Barritt/Getty Images.

Logan Rhoades / BuzzFeed / Via Showtime

Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures / Via youtube.com

item.title: What Makes Someone Great At Sex?
item.description:
It’s a little more complicated than touching each other’s genitals.

Think back to the last time you had a really REALLY good time hooking up with someone.

Universal Pictures / Via celebritymeat.tumblr.com

Whenever the sex/foreplay/mutual groping/making out/whatever you were doing was super hot and satisfying.

10 of 10, would bone again.

Roc Nation / Via beyxminaj.tumblr.com

Butwhat made it so great? Was it their absolute adoration of your body? Their level of experience? That crazy tongue trick they pulled out of nowhere?

Iron Horse Entertainment / Via estupidagirls.tumblr.com

Was it something they said or did? Or was it something they DIDNT say or do?

Maybe it was all about their attention to detail, their creativity, their questionably large inventory of amazing sex positions, or just the fact that they gave you an orgasm.

Comedy Central / Via communified-is-my-blog.tumblr.com

View Entire List ›
item.author: Casey Gueren

group.description: It's a little more complicated than touching each other's genitals.

content.description: Maybe it was all about their attention to detail, their creativity, their questionably large inventory of amazing sex positions, or just the fact that they gave you an orgasm.

item.description:
You have support here.

If you live in Canada, you know that our geese are not meant to be f*cked with.

AFV / Via youtube.com

We often feel completely defenseless against our nation's douchiest bird.

AFV / Via youtube.com

content.description: Tell us your scarring story in the comments below for a chance to be featured in a BuzzFeed post!

item.title: How Did You Quit Smoking Cigarettes?
item.description:
Help us help others.

Real talk: Everyone knows that smoking cigarettes is bad for you, but that doesn't always stop people from trying them.

Buena Vista Pictures

But we're curious: if you have smoked before, how did you quit?

Bravo

Did you slowly replace nicotine with chewing gum or the patch?

Disney

Maybe a loved one got sick as a result of smoking, and that convinced you to stop.

Bravo

View Entire List ›
item.author: Spencer Althouse

content.description: Bonus points if you tell us how long it's been since your last cigarette! Whether it's been 10 days or 10 years, let's celebrate the milestones.
